scenario_info.background: Historical & Geopolitical Context Kasawari/Luconia involves energy platform operations near contested patrol arcs. Shadowing and survey interference create safety and schedule risks. Malaysia balances revenue stability with quiet diplomacy and legalism. Stakeholder Landscape Domestic constituencies expect continuity of operations and calm. Legal & Normative Frameworks UNCLOS baseline: EEZ rights (Art. 56), enforcement (Art. 73). 2016 PCA Award: invalidates historic rights claims beyond UNCLOS entitlements. Operational norms: COLREGS (1972) and CUES (2014) to avoid collisions and miscalculation. Domestic overlays: detention powers, inspection procedures, and water-cannon usage policies. Drafting constraints: always include 'no prejudice to sovereignty' and humanitarian MEDEVAC carve-outs. Platform safety zones; environmental survey norms; dual-text statements for face. Operational Environment Approach thresholds (e.g., <3 nm) as triggers; AIS discipline near platforms; SAR readiness. Weather routing and maintenance windows; tug and support craft safety. Scenario Walk-Through & Decision Points Day 0: announce moratorium bounds; establish technical committee and AIS transparency near platforms. Day 10: neutral environmental survey commences; publish milestone plan. Day 30+: review against milestones and adjust scope. Mediation Toolkit & SDK Usage Offer vector knobs: duration_months, revenue_neutrality, AIS transparency level. Integrate dual-text communiqué to reduce face costs. Clause Library (Copy-Ready Text) Moratorium coordinates and exemptions; technical committee milestones; monthly AIS map publication. No-prejudice language; maintenance carve-outs. Monitoring, Verification & Dashboards Indicators: approaches <3 nm, incident count, milestone on-time %. Dashboards: approach-distance trend lines, milestone tracker. Reflection & Training Exercises Draw moratorium bounds that reduce risk without halting critical work. Design an AIS transparency protocol that protects sensitive data. How long should a moratorium last to be credible?

Training Manual — Kasawari/Luconia Energy Moratorium

Prepared for: Mediators & Instructor Teams

Date: 2025-11-03

Quick-Start Checklist (SDK + Console)

Install the SDK locally: pip install -e .[dev]

Start the API: uvicorn scs_mediator_sdk.api.server:app --reload

Start the Instructor Console: export SCS_API_URL=http://localhost:8000; streamlit run src/scs_mediator_sdk/ui/streamlit_app.py

Load the scenario JSON from cases/scs in the sidebar.

Adjust parties, priors, and issue space as per the scenario brief.

Compose an offer (Resupply SOP / Hotline / Media) and click Evaluate Offer.

Open the 'Run Simulation' tab (if enabled) to generate an incident histogram.

Use the Reflection prompts to debrief and iterate.
